Meeting the challenges of wildfire and extreme weather
PG&E's new Community Wildfire Safety Program is our response to years of drought
column2: extreme heat and 129 million dead trees that have created a "new normal" for our state
column3: and we must continue to adapt to meet these challenges.
civic and community leaders and customers to implement additional precautionary measures. Our goal is to help customers prepare for and stay safe during extreme weather events
column4: including sending notifications when and where possible when power may be turned off for safety.
